title: WHY PARTICIPATE IN HACKELITE'24?
content: HackElite '24 is a 24-hour national hackathon at Sri Jayachamarajendra College of Engineering, hosted by the Developer Student Club and Linux Campus Club. It brings together students and tech enthusiasts from across India to collaborate, innovate, and solve real-world challenges.

title: ABOUT JSS MAHAVIDYAPEETHA
content: Established in 2008 in Mysore, Karnataka, JSS Mahavidyapeetha is a prominent deemed university recognized under the UGC Act of 1956. Part of a larger educational network, it focuses on education, social service, and spirituality, with its Publishing Department playing a key role in literature and knowledge sharing.

title: ABOUT JSSSTU
content: JSS Science and Technology University (JSS STU), built on the legacy of SJCE, Mysuru, is dedicated to providing education in STEM and Management. It plays a crucial role in producing skilled professionals in these fields, aiming to transform society through research and innovation.

title: DEPARTMENT OF CSE
content: Our vision is to establish a globally recognized center of excellence in Computer Science & Engineering, focused on quality education, research, and innovation. We aim to provide a strong foundation, update curricula, foster collaborations, and promote innovation and entrepreneurship for societal impact.
